General.Name: Alkhorayef Water and Power Technologies Co
General.Description: Alkhorayef Water and Power Technologies Company designs, constructs, operates, maintains, and manages water and wastewater projects in Saudi Arabia. The company operates through three segments: Water, Waste Water, and Integrated Solutions. It provides engineering, procurement, and construction; and operation and maintenance services to wastewater plants, water treatment plants, wastewater networks, and other water related infrastructure, such as storm water networks. It also engages in contracting for building, roads, industrial, mechanical, marine, and civil work; cleaning of buildings and cities; operation and maintenance of medical centers, hospitals, airports, water disposal, and environmental pollution control. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. Alkhorayef Water & Power Technologies is a subsidiary of Alkhorayef Group Company.
General.Address: King Abdul Aziz Road (North), Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11595
